name: Albert A'Court
burialPlace: H.A.C. CEMETERY, ECOUST-ST. MEIN, Pas de Calais, France
notes: A'Court Albert of 12 Cleveland Rd Downham Rd Islington Middlesex died 28 Aug 1918 in France on active service. Administration. London 10 Mar 1919 to William A'Court packer.
